original: As a Patrician, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war on §Y$TARGET$§! over the §Y$TITLE$§!. This Casus Belli is not valid against much weaker Patricians within the same Republic.
translation: 作为一名贵人，§Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以为了§Y$TITLE$§!对§Y$TARGET$§!宣战。这一宣战理由对于同一共和国内弱得多的贵人是不正当的。

original: The merchants running one of your Trade Posts have abandoned their allegiance to your dynasty! They now serve one of the patrician families in the newly born Hansa, claiming that the upstart trade league affords them better opportunities to profit.
translation: 经营你其中一个贸易站的商人们宣布放弃对你的家族效忠！现在他们效力于一个贵人家族，该家族是新生的汉萨同盟的成员。汉萨同盟宣布他们这个异军突起的同盟会为商人们获利提供更好的机会。

original: Is not owned by other Merchant Republic
translation: 不属于其他商业共和国

original: Merchant Republics will not give up titles
translation: 那些商业共和国不会放弃头衔的！

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not have a truce with §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not have a truce with §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!
Ask §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W to declare an Embargo War against a rival Merchant Republic.
translation: 要求§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!宣布对敌对商业共和国发动禁运战争。

original: You can weaken a rival Merchant Republic and open up coastal counties for your Trade Posts by convincing a ruler to embargo them. Money usually does the trick. However, if you lose the war, §Yyou§! will pay war reparations.
translation: 你可以说服一个领主对敌对商业共和国下达贸易禁运，以达到削弱对手，并为你的贸易站开放沿海省份的目的。通常来说用金钱可以帮你办到这件事。然而，如果在战争中铩羽而归，§Y你§!需要支付战争赔款。

original: Select a rival Merchant Republic to embargo.
translation: 选择一个敌对的商业共和国以对其下达封港令。

original: Have §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! declare an Embargo War on §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! together with you. Offer §Y$GOLD$§!¤ to sweeten the deal. §RIf you lose the war, you will pay the war reparations.§!
translation: 让§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!一起和你宣布禁运战争，目标：§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!。给他们 §Y$GOLD$§!¤ 来促进达成交易。§R输掉战争将要支付战败赔款§!

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledName]§! and §Y[Actor.GetTitledName]§! have declared a joint Embargo War on §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetDynName]§!
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledName]§! 和 §Y[Actor.GetTitledName]§! 已宣布对§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetDynName]§!联合发动禁运战争

original: [Actor.GetTitledName] is offering us $COST$¤ to embargo [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName] and [ThirdPartyCharacter.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: [Actor.GetTitledName]给我们 $COST$¤，希望能够对[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]和[ThirdPartyCharacter.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]下达贸易禁运。

original: The insidious [ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] traders must be expelled from your lands. If you agree to declare an Embargo War on [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledName], we will not only join the war on your side but also present you with $COST$¤. Should we fail, [Actor.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will pay any war reparations.
translation: 狡猾的[ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]商贩必须从你的土地驱逐出去。如果你同意对[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledName]发动贸易禁运，我们不仅会在战争中加入你方，你也会获得 $COST$¤。如果我们的战争失败了，[Actor.PrimaryTitle.GetName]将会承担全部战争赔款。

original: After careful consideration, I have decided to accept your suggestion. Together, we shall force the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] traders out of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 经过深思熟虑，我决定采纳你的建议。我们会共同将[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]商人驱赶出[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]！\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Honestly, I find your embargo suggestion against [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] rather ludicrous. Why should I favor one money-grubbing Republic over another?\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 说实话，我发现你针对[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的封港令颇为可笑。两个国家都是铁公鸡，我怎么会偏爱其中一方呢？\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Money continues to flow through the Trade Post in [From.GetName], but your relationship with the merchant family that owns it has soured. To teach them a lesson without going to war, you could arrange for a mob to burn it down...
translation: 金钱持续流经[From.GetName]的贸易站，不过你与拥有这个贸易站的家族的关系却持续恶化。为了不大动干戈而又能给他们点颜色，你可以策划一起暴动，把该贸易站夷为平地……

original: No, things could quickly escalate out of control...
translation: 不！局面会演变到难以控制……

original: You decide not to move against the Trade Post.
translation: 你决定不对该贸易站采取行动。

original: An angry mob marches towards the Trade Post.
translation: 指使暴民向贸易站行进。

original: You and [From.GetTitledName] aren't exactly on the best of terms, and now it seems [From.GetSheHe] has encouraged an angry mob to burn down your Trade Post in [FromFrom.GetName]! Your small garrison has been surrounded, and the mob threatens to butcher them all unless you withdraw from [FromFrom.GetName].
translation: 确切地说，你和[From.GetTitledName]现在关系还不是很好。现在[From.GetSheHe]似乎已鼓动一伙暴民要将你在[FromFrom.GetName]的贸易站夷为平地！你人数极少的守备部队已被他们包围。他们还威胁说，除非你撤出[FromFrom.GetName]，否则他们将会把你的部队屠杀殆尽。

original: We have no choice. Dismantle the Trade Post.
translation: 我们已山穷水尽。拆除贸易站。

original: Point out the wealth the Trade Post brings to [FromFrom.GetName].
translation: 指出贸易站带给[FromFrom.GetName]的财富。

original: Use skillful diplomacy to disperse the mob.
translation: 运用高超的外交技巧以驱散暴民。

original: The mob you gathered successfully stormed the Trade Post and burnt it to the ground!
translation: 你纠集的暴民洗劫了贸易站并使之夷为平地。

original: Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen.
translation: 一切正如我所预料的那样进展着。

original: Envoys from [FromFrom.GetTitledName] have presented you with a significant bribe in the hope that you will use your influence to spare [FromFrom.GetHerHis] Trade Post in [From.GetName].
translation: 来自[FromFrom.GetTitledName]的使节以大笔金额贿赂你，希望你能动用你的影响力来拯救[FromFrom.GetSheHe]位于[From.GetName]的贸易站。

original: Ha! The fool will lose both his money and his Trade Post.
translation: 哈哈！那白痴不仅会损失一笔钱财，也会失去他的贸易站！

original: [From.GetTitledName] is quite skilled at stewardship, and [From.GetSheHe] somehow managed to sway the mob by telling them of the wealth that flows into the county through the Trade Post. The crowd has dispersed and the Trade Post remains untouched.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]非常善于经营。有赖于此，[From.GetSheHe]以贸易站为省份带来财富为由，安抚了那些暴民。群众们被疏散了，贸易站也没有遭到任何破坏。

original: Sigh. If you want something done...
[From.GetTitledName] has skillfully used diplomacy to somehow make the mob back down! The crowd has dispersed and the Trade Post remains untouched.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]运用高超的外交手段想方设法让那些暴民做出了让步！群众被疏散开了，贸易站也未遭受任何破坏。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], the vile monster [From.GetSheHe] is, took the money you offered [From.GetHerHim] as a bribe, but still did nothing to spare your Trade Post. The mob stormed the garrison and the handful of survivors who made it back to [Root.MercRepCapital.GetName] have provided chilling accounts of the brutality that ensued.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName][From.GetSheHe]这个衣冠禽兽，[From.GetHerHim]收了你给的贿赂，却没放过你的贸易站。暴民们以风卷残云之势歼灭了守备部队。几个幸存者逃回[Root.MercRepCapital.GetName]痛斥他们的暴行。
收了贿金还烧毁贸易站
